id: Elephant birds were blind, nocturnal and taller than Big Bird
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Ashley Strickland, CNNUpdated 8:11 PM ET, Tue October 30, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)You may have thought Big Bird was unrealistically gigantic, but he's still not the largest bird to ever walk the Earth. That honor goes to elephant birds, which stood 10 feet tall and roamed Madagascar thousands of years ago.
